notes: All dishes are free from Monosodium Glutamate (MSG)

Veg.name: Masala Papad
Veg.description: Papads topped with spicy mix of onion, tomatoes, green chilly - sprinkled with chaat masala.

Veg.name: Peanut Masala
Veg.description: Roasted peanut and chickpea tossed with kachumber salad.

Veg.name: Bhatti Da Paneer
Veg.description: Juicy chunks of paneer marinated in a special spice mix and cooked in tandoor. Served with mint chutney.

Veg.name: Paneer De Tikki
Veg.description: Paneer cubes marinated with herbs and spices, cooked with onion and capsicum in tandoor.

Veg.name: Tandoori Broccoli
Veg.description: Broccoli florets in cottage cheese, milk cake, pimentos, ginger and thyme, grilled in tandoor.

Veg.name: Hara Kebab
Veg.description: Spinach kebabs filled with cashew nuts, raisins, pine nuts and cheese. Griddle fried.

Veg.name: Tandoori Mushroom
Veg.description: Mushrooms stuffed with cottage cheese, potatoes & pistachios, grilled in tandoor.

Veg.name: Dahi Ke Kebab
Veg.description: Awadhi-style kebabs made with hung yoghurt, Bengal gram, bread crumbs, yellow chillies & coriander.

Veg.name: Tamatar Tulsi Shorba
Veg.description: Tomato shorba with basil, tempered with cumin, served with basil butter rusk.

Veg.name: Bhatti Ke Aloo
Veg.description: Char-grilled baby potatoes, pressed, tossed in spices and pudina chutney.

Non-Veg.name: Murgh Malai Kebab
Non-Veg.description: Chicken cubes marinated in cream, cumin, black pepper, cheddar and coriander, grilled in tandoor.

Non-Veg.name: Murgh K Sooley
Non-Veg.description: Boneless chicken marinated in cumin and coriander, smoked and grilled in tandoor.

Non-Veg.name: Bhatti Da Murga
Non-Veg.description: Chicken legs marinated with spices and hung curd, cooked in tandoor and finished on open-fire grill.

Non-Veg.name: Tandoori Jheenga
Non-Veg.description: Prawns marinated in lemon juice, ajwain, and cardamom, grilled in tandoor.

Non-Veg.name: Galouti
Non-Veg.description: Ultra-soft kebabs originally created for nobles who preferred not to chew.

Non-Veg.name: Masaledar Boti Kebab
Non-Veg.description: Tender mutton marinated in spiced hung curd, cooked in tandoor and tossed with house spices.

Veg.name: Paneer Makhani
Veg.description: Paneer cubes in creamy tomato gravy with fennel and fenugreek.

Veg.name: Paneer Labaabdaar
Veg.description: Paneer tikka in tomato-based gravy with cheese, garlic, cream and kasoori methi.

Veg.name: Kadhai Paneer
Veg.description: Paneer batons with bell peppers, tomatoes, coriander seeds and black pepper in creamy tomato gravy.

Veg.name: Sarson Ka Saag
Veg.description: Mustard leaf dish cooked with radish leaves, spinach, bathua, ginger and gramflour.

Veg.name: Paalak Lahsuni
Veg.description: Creamy spinach cooked with cumin, garlic and whole red chilli.

Veg.name: Daal Saat Nizaam
Veg.description: Hyderabadi seven-lentil delicacy tempered with seven different ingredients.

Veg.name: Dum Aloo
Veg.description: Soft kebab-style potato dish created for leisure-loving nobles.

Veg.name: Subzi Panchmael
Veg.description: Seasonal vegetables in rich yoghurt sauce with cardamom, ginger, and fennel seeds.

Veg.name: Daal Makhani
Veg.description: Whole urad lentils simmered overnight, finished with tomato puree, cream and ghee.

Non-Veg.name: Murgh Makhani
Non-Veg.description: Butter chicken in smooth tomato gravy with kasoori methi.

Non-Veg.name: Murgh Tikka Labaabdaar
Non-Veg.description: Chicken tikka in tomato cheese garlic gravy, finished with cream and kasoori methi.

Non-Veg.name: SO Speciality Mutton
Non-Veg.description: Kid shanks cooked in their own marrow with cardamom-tinged juices.

Non-Veg.name: Kadhai Chicken
Non-Veg.description: Chicken tikka with bell peppers and tomatoes in creamy tomato gravy.

Non-Veg.name: Kadhai Jhinga
Non-Veg.description: Spicy shrimp stir-fried with pomegranate, green peppercorns, and cardamom masala.

Biryani.name: Nizami Tarkari Biryani
Biryani.description: Aromatic rice and vegetables cooked on dum in Awadhi style in sealed terracotta pots.

Biryani.name: Dum Ki Biryani Mutton
Biryani.description: Lamb and saffron-flavored rice cooked on dum in sealed terracotta pots.

Biryani.name: Dum Ki Biryani Chicken
Biryani.description: Chicken and saffron-flavored rice cooked on dum in sealed terracotta pots.

Rice.name: Raita
Rice.description: Choice of bottle gourd, boondi, cucumber, or tomato & onion.
